name: Stiletto

ski.name: LETHAL KNIFE
desc: ACTIVE: Stiletto readies a special knife and resets his basic attack timer. The next basic attack within 3s deals bonus physical damage to non-towers but can not score a critical strike. Lethal Knife gains 5 permanent bonus physical damage whenever it delivers a killing blow on an enemy non-hero unit, and gains double the bonus on enemy hero units. Stacks up to 70 times.
study: Reset basic attack, bonus on-hit physical damage

ski.name: SWALLOW's FLIGHT
desc: ACTIVE: Stiletto dashes in the opposite direction and gains bonus movement speed for 2s.
study: Dash in opposite direction, bonus movement speed
update: Bonus Movement Speed â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: CERTAIN DEATH
desc: ACTIVE: Stiletto throws a deadly knife to assassinate his victim, dealing massive pure damage to target enemy hero unit.
study: Pure Damage to Target Hero Unit
update: Pure Damage â†‘ Cast Range â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: FATAL SHOTS
desc: PASSIVE: Stiletto gains bonus Attack Damage and bonus Critical Chance._ACTIVE: Stiletto gains a massive amount of bonus Attack Damage and bonus Critical Chance for 5s. This ability's passive effects are disabled during cooldown.
data: ACTIVE:_Bonus Attack Damage: 10/20/30/40, Bonus Critical Chance: 6%/8%/10%/12%, Mana Cost: 50, Cooldown: 15s
PASSIVE: Bonus Attack Damage: 8/12/16/20, Bonus Critical Chance: 3%/4%/5%/6%
study: Bonus Attack Damage, Bonus Critical Chance

story: Tired of scholarly honour and official rank, Stiletto abandoned his official position and retired. His blade is quick and accurate.
